revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR3500L |revision=v2 |series=N300 |fcc_date=07/13/2011 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H172 |manuf_rev=T00 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY310400153 |ic_id=4054A-10400153 |pcb_id=U12H172T00 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47186B0 |cpu1_cspeed=480 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0D |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6JB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM47186B0 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=Vampik, Tomato (Shibby), Tomato RAF (Victek), |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=A0:21:B7 |oui_eth=A0:21:B7 }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.netgear.com/home/products/wirelessrouters/work-and-play/WNR3500L.aspx Product page] {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNR3500Lv2|vs_id=19362}}
OEM: [[Foxconn]] (Hon Hai) U12H172T00/U12H172T99 {{See also|Netgear WNR3500|Netgear PCB ID|Netgear}} FCC photos show the device with a [[Broadcom]] BCM4718A1 WiSoC, BCM4331 : wireless chip, and a W9751G6JB-25 RAM chip. This is completely wrong.
*[http://openlinksys.info/forum/viewthread.php?thread_id=13787 ''Internal photos''] on '''OpenLinksys.info''' *[http://openrouter.info/forum/viewtopic.php?f=17&t=1435 ''Tomato dla Netgear WNR3500L v2''] on '''OpenLinksys.info''' (PL)
{{TechInfoDepot|Netgear_WNR3500L_v2.0}} :[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_wnr3500l_v2 Techdata: Netgear WNR3500L v2] on OpenWRT
===Firmware=== * DD-WRT [https://dd-wrt.com/support/router-database/?model=WNR3500L_v2 supported] (r28112 and above) * OpenWRT trunk isn't supported: [https://forum.openwrt.org/t/netgear-wnr3500l-v2-install-and-bricked/3179/9 kernel 2.6 omit needed NAND flash driver], work [https://forum.openwrt.org/t/nand-flash-driver-for-bcm47xx-wnr3500lv2/7116/54 in progress] * Tomato [http://tomato.groov.pl/download/K26RT-N/build5x-140-MultiWAN/Netgear%20WNR3500Lv2/ supported] * Firmware [https://vampik.ru/post/1/ by Vampik] (Ru), based on the firmware by lly и theMIROn, based on the firmware «by Oleg».
; Debricking * [https://www.myopenrouter.com/article/how-debrick-your-wnr3500lv2-using-windows-and-usb-ttl-cable How to Debrick Your WNR3500Lv2 Using Windows and a USB-TTL Cable]
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=146632 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/forum/thread/30718/3500L-V2/ On '''MyOpenRouter''' forums] *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/article/36525/How-to-Install-Third-Party-Firmware-on-NETGEAR-WNR3500Lv2-With-A-Serial-Cable-on-Linux/ ''How to Install Third Party Firmware on Netgear WNR3500Lv2''] *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/article/34695/Quick-Review-and-Specifications-of-NETGEAR-WNR3500Lv2-Gigabit-Open-Source-Router/ ''Quick Review and Specifications of Netgear WNR3500Lv2''] *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/article/36506/How-to-Install-Third-Party-Firmware-on-NETGEAR-WNR3500Lv2/ ''OUI of A0:21:B7 pictured'' in these router screenshots]
===Models=== *[[Netgear WNR3500v1]] • WNR3500 • U12H092T00 (Marvell) *[[Netgear WNR3500v2]] • WNR3500V2 • U12H127T00_NETGEAR *[[Netgear WNR3500v2]](VCNA) • WNR3500V2VC • U12H127T70 *[[Netgear WNR3500U]] • WNR3500U • U12H136T00_NETGEAR *[[Netgear WNR3500Lv1]] • WNR3500L • U12H136T99_NETGEAR *[[Netgear WNR3500Lv2]] • WNR3500LV2 • U12H172T00/U12H172T99
===How To Identify Which Model Router You Have=== <small>{{Netgear WNR3500 Comparison Chart}}</small>
